title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 15 - Admission And Retention Of Patients
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 15 - Admission And Retention Of Patients

State Regulations
§ 15.0 - [Repealed]
§ 15.1 - General
§ 15.2 - Personal property of a patient
§ 15.3 - Information to be given patients
§ 15.4 - Admission and retention of certain nonobjecting mentally retarded persons by schools
§ 15.5 - Informal admissions
§ 15.6 - Limitations on use of consecutive two-physician certificate admission
§ 15.7 - Request for court authorization to retain a voluntary patient
§ 15.8 - Involuntary admission on the certificate of a director of community services or his designee
§ 15.9 - [Repealed]
§ 15.10 - [Repealed]
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. II, subch. A, pt. 15

Statutory authority: Mental Hygiene Law, §§7.09, 9.01, 9.39, 13.07, 13.09[b], 16.00, 19.07[a], 29.01, 31.02, 31.04

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
